fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, appear at someone's house, rampaging there. You cannot do this night one.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, 8 random non-neutral players have pages attached to them. When they are visited or die, their page is collected. You are unaware who has pages.
- You start the game knowing at least one player who doesn't have a page.
- When your 8 pages are collected, you die. It's possible for you to collect pages.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone without having your pages collected.
